KARMA

KARMA is a decentralized application built on EOSIO. It is designed to incentivize users to do good in the world and receive KARMA for helping out mankind. It welcomes more users to join their growing community and help KARMA change the world.

Airdrop name KARMA
URL http://www.karmaapp.io
Token KARMA
Airdrop time The second quarter of 2018
Snapshot time 2nd June, 2018
Airdrop quantity 7,200,000,000
Airdrop proportion 1EOS:8KARMA
Airdrop rules The tokens will be airdropped to EOS holders.
Source EOS TOOLS
